General.Name: Veranda Learning Solutions Limited
General.Description: Veranda Learning Solutions Limited develops an online education platform in India. The company offers diversified and integrated learning solutions through online, offline hybrid, and offline blended formats for students, aspirants, graduates, professionals, and corporate employees. It also provides long term and short-term preparatory courses for competitive exams; professional courses; exam-oriented courses; corporate courses; and short-term upskilling and reskilling courses. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Chennai, India.
General.Address: Old No 54, New No 34, Chennai, India, 600017
